thread.title: Keith Olbermann Apologizes To The World For "Unforgivable Actions" Of Trump Regime
thread.title_full: Keith Olbermann Apologizes To The World For "Unforgivable Actions" Of Trump Regime

title: Keith Olbermann Apologizes To The World For "Unforgivable Actions" Of Trump Regime
text:
Keith Olbermann Apologizes To The World For "Unforgivable Actions" Of Trump Regime | Posted By Tim Hains On Date January 30, 2017 NEW VIDEO: An apology to the world for Trump, from the citizens of a nation built on the sacrifice of immigrants. pic.twitter.com/fIpxhMlAVl â Keith Olbermann (@KeithOlbermann) January 30, 2017 
'The Resistance' host Keith Olbermann issues an apology to the world on behalf of Americans. "We will not forget that we are the descendants of the immigrants," he said. "Often the refugees. We are the modern equivilents of those who the Pig Trump has banished and degraded, and in many cases, literally sentenced to death." "Donald Trump has extinguished the light of the world," he said. Related Videos
